function_reachability: Is it impossible for function 'incr' to reach function 'printf'?
Is it impossible for function 'printf' to reach function 'main'?
Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'incr'?
loop_reachability: Can the loop with condition 'i <= a / 2' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i <= a / 2' always executed?
Can the loop with condition 'i < 9' be skipped entirely?
Is the loop with condition 'i < 9' always executed?
dominators: Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i <= a / 2' without passing through its header block?
Is there at least one path that reaches the body of the loop with condition 'i < 9' without passing through its header block?
data_dependency: Does the value assigned to 'counter (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
Does the value assigned to 'a (line 6)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'a (line 6)' remain in use at the end of function 'incr'?
Is variable 'i (line 12)' live at the end of function 'isprime'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'int numbers[] = { 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 13, 17, 19 };' be considered dead code?
